FuncDef:
The bgp-local-ifnet mtu command sets an MTU for BGP local IFNET tunnels.
The undo bgp-local-ifnet mtu command restores the default MTU of BGP local IFNET tunnels.
By default, the MTU of BGP local IFNET tunnels is 1500.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an MTU for BGP local IFNET tunnels.
The value is an integer ranging from 46 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the MTU of LDP LSPs is different from that of BGP local IFNET tunnels, traffic may fail to be forwarded. To set an MTU for BGP local IFNET tunnels, run the bgp-local-ifnet mtu command.
